title: Queen's Blade Rebellion: Seiran no Hime Kishi
original_name: クイーンズブレイド リベリオン青嵐の姫騎士
sinopse: The series' protagonist Annelotte is seeking the head of reigning Queen Claudette for revenge and justice. Following her swift defeat and imprisonment Annelotte is now building a rebellion army to take on Claudette once more!
